commit.message:
nvptx.c (walk_args_for_param): Promote arg reg decls.

	* config/nvptx/nvptx.c (walk_args_for_param): Promote arg reg
	decls.
	(nvptx_declare_function_name): Insert formatting tabs for
	consistency.

From-SVN: r227104
